## Source: ossf-package-analysis (df1e3a9bd21e4d7ca6ae9595850002d67806ca9fd408d068bad6ce3a8a4c2dbf)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@sangith/newrelic' @ 1.2.3 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
